mapper.insert: insert into t_shangpin (shangpinId, shangpinName, shangpinMark, shangpinMark1, shangpinMark2, shangpinMark3, shangpinDate, shangpinDate1, shangpinZong, shangpinJin, shangpinXiao, shangpinLirun, shangpinType, shangpinType1, shangpinImg, shangpinImgName, sptypeId, sptypeName, userId, userName, bumenId, bumenName, roleId, roleName ) values (#{shangpinId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shangpinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shangpinMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shangpinMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shangpinMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shangpinMark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shangpinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shangpinDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shangpinZong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shangpinJin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shangpinXiao,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shangpinLirun,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shangpinType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shangpinType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shangpinImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shangpinImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sptypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sptypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_shangpin set shangpinName = #{shangpinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shangpinMark = #{shangpinMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shangpinMark1 = #{shangpinMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shangpinMark2 = #{shangpinMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shangpinMark3 = #{shangpinMark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shangpinDate = #{shangpinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shangpinDate1 = #{shangpinDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shangpinZong = #{shangpinZong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shangpinJin = #{shangpinJin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, shangpinXiao = #{shangpinXiao,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, shangpinLirun = #{shangpinLirun,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, shangpinType = #{shangpinType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shangpinType1 = #{shangpinType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shangpinImg = #{shangpinImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shangpinImgName = #{shangpinImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sptypeId = #{sptypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sptypeName = #{sptypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bumenId = #{bumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bumenName = #{bumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roleId = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, roleName = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where shangpinId = #{shangpinId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select shangpinId, shangpinName, shangpinMark, shangpinMark1, shangpinMark2, shangpinMark3, shangpinDate, shangpinDate1, shangpinZong, shangpinJin, shangpinXiao, shangpinLirun, shangpinType, shangpinType1, shangpinImg, shangpinImgName, sptypeId, sptypeName, userId, userName, bumenId, bumenName, roleId, roleName from t_shangpin where shangpinId = #{shangpinId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
